newsitem.title: FRANCE: New director for France's air cargo Vatry project.
newsitem.headline: New director for France's air cargo Vatry project.

text.p: SAEM Europort Paris Champagne, a semi-public company set up to transform an ex-NATO airfield into an all-cargo airport has appointed Jean-Noel Chapulut as its new director, effective April 1.
Chapulut, 55, joins Europort from the Union Nationale Interprofessionelle du Logement, a housing sector association and previously occupied several civil service posts.
He replaces Jean-Claude Reboulin who is take up the post of director general manager at Le Havre's Chamber of Commerce. - Reuters Air Cargo Newsroom Tel+44 171 542 7706 Fax:5017
